page.title: 05Employment in West Enfield
page.content: This area is a dormitory suburb and the majority of men are employed outside the area, many of them commuting to either the City or the West End of London.Of these the majority work for large companies. There are no factories or dominating industries in the area and the majority of the men surveyed are in fact self_employed either in a professional capacity or in small businesses. Approximately half of the women are fully employed as housewives and mothers.Of the rest,two thirds are employed part_time either within the area or close by. From necessity some women from one parent families work full time and these tend to work outside the area. The rest of those employed full time generally work in the area.
